name: the decisive device
description:
elo, welcome to decisive device, an infinifactory/mariomaker-like game where you have to roll dice using elaborate mechanisms, made for the gmtk game jam 2022. there was gonna be more than 4 levels, but my fingers are seven light years wide and i accidentally ended up deleting most of the game. woops

make sure to play the game as zoomed out as your display can possibly get, as the text can get cut off. left click to place blocks, right click to remove them, 1-4 to access inventory, t to toggle test mode and left click in test mode to interact with machine parts

music is "World 2" from a flash game called "the man who can't jump"

-------------------------------------------------------------

and yes, there are a ton of bugs that i'm aware of:

- being able to place blocks out of bounds on level 4

- the dice disappearing (this is just a problem with the level shaping and ground-checking)

- in very niche circumstances, being able to delete the dice (?)
